name: Orbflux: Earth
text:
{1}, Discard Orbflux: Earth: Meditate (Put an orb counter on a Chi you control. If you don’t control one, first create a Chi enchantment token with "{1}, Sacrifice this: Copy target instant or sorcery spell you control with mana value less than or equal to the number of orb counters on this. You may choose new targets for the copy.") 
Enchant Chi you control
Enchanted Chi is a creature in addition to its other types and has base power and base toughness each equal to the number of orb counters on it.
Whenever enchanted chi attacks, double the number of orb counters on it.
